ygData.subject: Why Neriak?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like you re playing your Troll like a Dark Elf or a Human. Unless you have friends, why would you want to hunt in Nektulous instead of Innothule
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Sounds like you're playing your Troll like a Dark Elf or
a Human. Unless you have friends, why would you want to
hunt in Nektulous instead of Innothule swamp?
<snip>
I migrated simply because I wanted to group with my wife
when she created her Dark Elf Necro. I got bound inside
Neriak, and then she didn't like her necro and went back
to her Woodelf Bard. I was 6th when I migrated and
nearly died in the process in a nasty spot in Oasis.
Someone with an unmeasureable IQ was training Spectres
all over the zone hoping someone would save them and
killing alot of people in the process. So I decided to
stick around Neriak until I felt comfortable that even
if attacked in Oasis that I could make the zone.
I liked the Innuthule Swamp and am heading back there
for that reason. I want to go to Faydwer because of the
loot possibilities that I have seen with my own eyes.
The minos in Steamfont looks like a fun place. Guk
looks promising, but I may lag too bad to make it worth
my while. We shall see. I am making a run tonight back
to the swamp so I can train.
I am interested in OOT because of the Grobb Cleaver
Quest, but do not want to get into OOT and find out that
the Troll I need to kill is level 25 and I'm only 10th.
I also plan on completing the Mushroom Head quest for
the Froglock skin mask. Any clue what level that MOB is?
Thanks.

--
Cronik
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
9th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
